name: openmx

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
OpenMX (Open source package for Material eXplorer) is a software package
for nano-scale material simulations based on density functional theories
(DFT), norm-conserving pseudopotentials, and pseudo-atomic localized
basis functions.

dependencies.name: fftw-api
dependencies.description:
Arm Performance Libraries provides optimized standard core math
libraries for high-performance computing applications on Arm processors.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description: Cray/HPE packaging of MVAPICH2 for HPE Apollo systems

dependencies.name: scalapack
dependencies.description:
ScaLAPACK is a library of high-performance linear algebra routines for
parallel distributed memory machines

dependencies.name: sse2neon
dependencies.description:
A C/C++ header file that converts Intel SSE intrinsics to Arm/Aarch64
NEON intrinsics.
